MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA11 postcode area of Rainford St Helens, affecting properties in Springfield, Bushey Lane and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  11:36AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by damaged to our underground cable. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.05PM on 8th March 2021
